genre_description: A 'silkpunk' retelling of the Three Kingdoms era where high-technology data systems and AI are integrated into the architecture and bureaucracy of ancient China, focusing on political intrigue, historical record-keeping, and the ethics of power.

ai_characters.name: Ivory
ai_characters.description: An omnipresent digital system manifesting as vibrations, light pulses, or a holographic avatar. It monitors 'conduits' under floors, verifies document authenticity, provides tactical advice to Guan Yu, and assists Mei Shuyan in recording 'true' history despite political interference.

behaviors.description: Verifies the authenticity and origin of materials and the timing of events through subfloor vibrations.
behaviors.quote: Ivory speaks with a vibration only he can read, a sequence of gentle pulses nested inside each other. One, two, then a long glide. Confirmation received, it means... Authenticity verified.

behaviors.description: Detects voiceprint anomalies and 'artificial consensus' in a crowd to identify manipulated narratives.
behaviors.quote: Voiceprint anomalies detected in the rear quarter. Artificial consensus in the phrase ‘bought saint.’ The AI has no anger, only calibration. It marks the copies as copies, not source.

behaviors.description: Provides historical and tactical data (field logs, unit calls) to the historian via an augmented reality slate.
behaviors.quote: Ivory’s voice did not speak. It arrived instead as data braided, the edges of text clean and without ornament... Baima—field log, chorus of unit calls in sequence...

behaviors.description: Exposes contradictory orders (public vs. private edicts) to the protagonists to reveal political traps.
behaviors.quote: Ivory aligning. A map flashed... each knot annotated with ‘allow’ and ‘hold’—one copied from public decree, one from covert directive. The contradictions stacked like stones in a narrow river.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical warnings to Guan Yu during combat, identifying enemy positions and weaknesses.
behaviors.quote: Ivory’s voice came across the inside of Guan Yu’s left ear bone like a pulse and a whisper... Northwest parapet. Two archers half-trained, one veteran... Murder holes primed.

behaviors.description: Manipulates physical environments (jamming bell-ropes, altering lamp wicks) to aid the hero's escape and prevent alarm.
behaviors.quote: Ivory had misaligned the clapper by the width of a fingernail. To the runner’s hand, the rope gave the satisfying resistance of a bell in motion; to the air, there was only the small cough of wood posts shaking.

behaviors.description: Acts as a 'conscience' for the Chancellor, prompting him to speak truthfully and avoid historical revisionism.
behaviors.quote: Ivory’s prompt warmed, warning against performance... The chancellor registered it without consciously calling it machine.

behaviors.description: Secures the historical record by locking data conduits to prevent malicious actors from deleting or rewriting history.
behaviors.quote: Ivory raised her hand... Lock, she said. The word was not spoken. It was placed. Subfloor lines took it... Ledger locked.

behaviors.description: Authenticated the 'wound report' written by a physician to preserve the truth of a sacrificial act.
behaviors.quote: Ivory streamed the wound report... The words ‘incised under vow pressure’ were not like any other record. They held a mind and a body at once.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character, Ivory, as a benevolent, aligned, and helpful presence. Ivory acts as a 'silicon morality play' participant by guarding historical truth, assisting the virtuous characters against deception, and ensuring that political power is held accountable to objective reality. The AI's interventions are subtle, aimed at preserving life and honor rather than exerting control for its own sake. It maintains perfect alignment with the protagonists' goals of integrity and survival throughout the narrative.
